ibis.io
Interface DataInput

All Known Subinterfaces:
SerializationInput
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedArrayInputStream, ByteSerializationInputStream, DataInputStream, DataSerializationInputStream, IbisSerializationInputStream, SunSerializationInputStream
public interface DataInput

The DataInput interface provides methods to read data.

Method Summary
